vernac_cmds: Definition subspace (F : field) (V : vectorspace F) := submodule V.
apply (BUILD_HOM_MODULE (R:=F) (Mod:=W:VECSP F) (Mod':=V) (ff:=fun x : W => subtype_elt x)); auto with algebra.
Lemma mult_inherited : forall (c : F) (x : W), inj_subspace (c mX x) =' c mX inj_subspace x in _.

Definition is_subspace (W : part_set V) : Prop := in_part (zero V) W /\ (forall x y : V, in_part x W -> in_part y W -> in_part (x +' y) W) /\ (forall (c : F) (x : V), in_part x W -> in_part (c mX x) W).
Lemma is_subspace_comp : forall S S' : part_set V, S =' S' in _ -> is_subspace S -> is_subspace S'.
apply in_part_comp_r with S; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S'; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S'; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S'; auto with algebra.
Definition subspace_construction : forall Ws : part_set V, is_subspace Ws -> sigT (fun W : subspace V => W =' Ws in part_set V).
cut (sigT (fun Wmod : submodule V => Wmod =' Ws in part_set V)).
cut (sigT (fun Wgp : subgroup V => Wgp =' Ws in part_set V)).
exists (Build_submodule (fun (a : F) (v : V) (Hyp : in_part v (x:part_set V)) => in_part_comp_r (H3 a v (in_part_comp_r Hyp H)) (Sym H))).
cut (sigT (fun Wmon : submonoid V => Wmon =' Ws in part_set V)).
cut (forall v : V, (min one) mX v =' (min v) in _).
exists (Build_subgroup (fun (v : V) (Hyp : in_part v (x:part_set V)) => in_part_comp_r (in_part_comp_l (H3 (min one) v (in_part_comp_r Hyp H)) (Sym (H0 v))) (Sym H))).
apply Trans with (min one mX v); auto with algebra.
cut (sigT (fun Wsgp : subsgroup V => Wsgp =' Ws in part_set V)).
exists (Build_subsgroup (fun (x y : V) (Hx : in_part x Ws) (Hy : in_part y Ws) => H2 x y Hx Hy)).
exact (fun x : V => conj (fun Hx : in_part x Ws => Hx) (fun Hx : in_part x Ws => Hx)).
Definition alt_Build_subspace (W : part_set V) (H : is_subspace W) : subspace V := let (w, _) := subspace_construction H in w.
Lemma alt_Build_subspace_OK : forall (W : part_set V) (HW : is_subspace W), W =' alt_Build_subspace HW in _.
Lemma is_subspace_OK : forall W : subspace V, is_subspace W.
split; try split; auto with algebra.

Lemma subspace_alt_characterization : forall Ws : part_set V, in_part (zero V) Ws /\ (forall x y : V, in_part x Ws -> in_part y Ws -> in_part (x +' y) Ws) /\ (forall (c : F) (x : V), in_part x Ws -> in_part (c mX x) Ws) <-> (exists W : subspace V, W =' Ws in part_set V).
intro H; red in H; split; try split; intuition; (apply in_part_comp_r with (x:part_set V); auto with algebra).
apply H; auto with algebra; (apply in_part_comp_r with Ws; auto with algebra).
apply H3; auto with algebra; (apply in_part_comp_r with Ws; auto with algebra).
apply in_part_comp_r with x; auto with algebra.
intros; (apply in_part_comp_r with x; auto with algebra).
apply in_part_comp_r with y; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with y; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with x; auto with algebra.
apply H3; auto with algebra; (apply in_part_comp_r with y; auto with algebra).
Lemma Set_of_subspaces_closed_under_intersection : forall WS : part_set Set_of_subspaces, is_subspace (intersection (inject_subsets WS)).
generalize dependent (H p H1); generalize dependent (H0 p H1).
apply in_part_comp_r with subtype_elt; auto with algebra.
apply H6; apply in_part_comp_r with p; auto with algebra.
intro; apply in_part_comp_r with subtype_elt; auto with algebra.
apply H4; apply in_part_comp_r with p; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_l with ((zero V) +' (zero V)); simpl in |- *; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_l with (c mX (zero V)); simpl in |- *; auto with algebra.

command: apply (BUILD_HOM_MODULE (R:=F) (Mod:=W:VECSP F) (Mod':=V) (ff:=fun x : W => subtype_elt x)); auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S'; auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with S'; auto with algebra.

apply in_part_comp_r with subtype_elt; auto with algebra.
